questions.subject: Humanities(Social_Studies)
questions.question: Study Source A. What is the purpose of the cartoonist in drawing this cartoon? Explain your answer.

questions.subject: Humanities(Social_Studies)
questions.question: Study Source B. Does the professor think that ASEAN can solve the haze problem? Explain your answer.

questions.subject: Humanities(Social_Studies)
questions.question: Study Source C. How far is Source C useful in understanding Indonesia's effort in solving the regional haze issue? Explain your answer.

questions.subject: Humanities(Social_Studies)
questions.question: Study Source D. Are you surprised by the comments of Mrs Kahirani in this source? Explain your answer.

questions.subject: Humanities(Social_Studies)
questions.question: Study Sources E and F. Both Source E and Source F have different views towards the ability of Indonesia to solve the regional haze problem. Whose view is more reliable here? Explain your answer.
